title: 12/19: Slump Busters, Fantasy Jeopardy, Regulators and More! (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Special guest Nick Kostos joins us later on today's show which is an extended version of FFT! We start with some DST talk for Week 16 and then get into "Slump Busters" (5:30) as we wonder if Phillip Lindsay, Jared Goff, James White and a few others can get back on track ... News and notes (14:30), some of your emails (18:25) and good players with tough matchups in Week 16 (27:30) like Kenny Golladay and James Conner ... Nick hops on (34:45) to talk about how much he values his 2017 undefeated Fantasy Football season and some players he'll be targeting in next year's draft. Then we play some Fantasy Jeopardy (49:40) and the Fantasy Regulators (1:01:30) return to settle league disputes ... Your emails at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: Slump Busters, good players with touch matchups, Fantasy Jeopardy, Fantasy Regulators and special guest Nick Kostos all on today's show.
